Uses of Class
org.waarp.common.exception.CryptoException

Packages that use CryptoException
org.waarp.common.crypto Classes implementing Encryption for Password support or for File Encryption AES is the best compromise in term of security and efficiency. 
org.waarp.common.crypto.ssl Classes implementing SSL support for Netty To generate the stores for Waarp for instance, you need to create 2 JKS keyStore.
